SVG Icon System

The page demonstrations how to implement an svg icon system. It touches on various techniques that come in handy based on an icon's context within the page.

Inline SVG - SVG <use> with External Source

The Basics

Using an external svg sprite gives us caching and the ability to use inline svg. For additional information, see Chris Coyier's great explanation. Svg icon "fill" definitions should be removed from each svg icon so that the icons can inherit the body color by default. Remove "fill" definitions also allows svg icons to be colored using CSS.

 = <svg class="icon"><use xlink:href="icons/sprite.svg#heart"/></svg>
 = <svg class="icon"><use xlink:href="icons/sprite.svg#fire"/></svg>
